lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins agreed to terms with offensive lineman Jason Fabini, who had signed with the team last season as a backup. He ended up starting 13 games after injuries to Randy Thomas and Jon Jansen. He is projected to be a reserve. Fabini spent eight seasons with the Jets and one with the Dallas Cowboys before joining the Redskins.
